pages.title: Lava Sponge
pages.text: $(italic)When you held a wet sponge in your hands, you thought that there must be a counterpart for lava, too. Even though you haven't stumbled across one yet, that hasn't stopped you from inventing one, of course.$(br2)This should make navigation in the depths of the world and beyond that hellish portal much easier.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: ...or so you thought, until you realized that the lava-soaked sponge also has an $(italic)unfortunate$() side effect.$(br)You should have guessed.

pages.title: Furnace Fuel
pages.text: The Lava Sponge can be used as highly efficient fuel in the furnace, drying it in the process.
